example.text: These mutations, identified by standard methods of reverse transcription, PCR,dideoxy-chain termination, and cycle sequencing, alter highly conserved sequences at intron/exon boundaries and cause the RNA-splicing apparatus not to properly recognize the normal splice junction.

We show that the cAMP-CRP activator complex has recognized two sites in tsx-p2 that are separated by 33 bp : a high-affinity site (CRP-1) overlaps the-35 region, and a low-affinity site (CRP-2) is centered around position-74 bp.
